price: at na sila, sa pagdurusang dulot ng Panginoon nila, ay mga nababagabag
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna hum min ʿadhābi rabbihim mush'fiqūna
